title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.20 - Camping, shelters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.20 - Camping, shelters

State Regulations

No person shall engage in camping, or erect or maintain a
tent, other structure for shelter, or camp in any park without a
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
